Instruction: In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, brown sugar, and vanilla until well blended. Stir in the cooked rice, and mix until combined.
In a separate bowl, beat the eggs; gradually stir into the thickened rice mixture until well combined.
Refrigerate until thoroughly chilled before serving.
For a special sacred experience, increase the cayenne pepper to 2 tablespoons and cut the sugar to 1/2 cup. Enjoy it as the Aztecs did!
For optimal results, cover and chill in the refrigerator overnight.
